metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3567 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability has been found in Linux Kernel and classified asproblematic. This vulnerability affects the functioninet6_stream_ops/inet6_dgram_ops of the component IPv6 Handler. Themanipulation leads to race condition. It is recommended to apply a patch tofix this issue. VDB-211090 is the identifier assigned to thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
